Cloning tactics further reduce the genetic imprint and ultimately will not preserve the species. This is precisely the condition that occurred within the Zeta race strains. Due to the Stellar Spiral Alignments, Stellar Activations and Stellar Wave Infusions of the ascension period, the process of cellular transmutation can be brieﬂy called into action. This will allow for a self-generated bio-ener- getically induced transmutative evacuation from Phantom Earth to take place, for those who participate in the Stellar Activation process. The DNA 482
